Articles.Content:
With the new aero system in place, we need more interesting challenges. This challenge entails landing a drop pod on a planet WITHOUT an engine or parachute.

The idea is to use aero brakes or large craft to slow down and land without any help.

Rules:

-Stock Parts

-Planet must have an atmosphere

-No parachutes

-No engines

-No planes/gliders (drop POD, not PLANE!)

-Hyperedit allowed for orbit, not landing.

Win Condition:

-Someone survived the landing

Note: Ejecting (EVA) or having parts explode is O.K.

If you succeed, be sure to post a picture of your pod, and tell us where you landed it.

(Viable options are Kerbin, Laythe, Eve, and Duna)

Example:

[http://imgur.com/a/CzVeY](http://imgur.com/a/CzVeY)

Landed at Kerbin at roughly ~19.6m/s
